questions.question: Did you take your blood pressure medication(s) today?
options: Yes, but taking differently than prescribed
Yes, but I still have more blood pressure medication to take
No, not yet but I plan to
No, I do not plan to
No, I am out of my blood pressure medication

questions.question: If you are not taking medication, was this discontinued by your doctor?

show_if.value: No, I do not plan to

questions.question: Please let us know why you do not plan to take your medication.
